name: Accord.NET Framework
tagline: Provides machine learning, mathematics, statistics, computer vision, computer audition, and scientific computing to .NET.
body:
## Introduction

The Accord.NET Framework provides machine learning, mathematics, statistics, computer vision, computer audition, and several scientific computing related methods and techniques to .NET. The project extends the popular AForge.NET Framework providing a more complete scientific computing environment.

* [Download latest releases](https://code.google.com/p/accord/downloads/list)
* [Documentation](http://accord-net.github.io/docs/Index.html) / [getting started](https://code.google.com/p/accord/wiki/GettingStarted)
* [Publications](https://code.google.com/p/accord/wiki/Showcase) / [articles and guides](https://code.google.com/p/accord/wiki/Publications?tm=6)
* [Sample applications](https://code.google.com/p/accord/wiki/SampleApplications?tm=6)

  ![Accord.NET Framework](http://accord-net.github.io/docs/resources/Accord.NET%20%28logo%20large%29.png)
